title: Flamingo
description:
A flamingo, a waterbird with pink feathers and long neck and legs. Depicted as a flamingo in full profile facing left, standing on one leg, usually with a long, black beak.

May be used to represent summer fun or as a pink accent color.
apple_vendor_description: The flamingo emoji on Apple devices stands with elegant posture, its distinctive pink plumage rendered with smooth gradients and subtle shading that convey its delicate texture.  Its long, curved neck gracefully arches, and the beak, subtly detailed, adds to its lifelike charm as depicted in Apple's signature glossy 3D style.  This vibrant avian symbol, full of tropical flair, is often used to evoke feelings of joy, summer, or a touch of the exotic in digital conversations.
